sentences.sContent: Would you please rewind the thread onto the reel?
sentences.sContent_eng: Would you please rewind the thread onto the reel?
sentences.sCn: 请你把这些线重新绕在线轴儿上好吗?。

sentences.sContent: All the things I would change if we could only rewind.
sentences.sContent_eng: All the things I would change if we could only rewind.
sentences.sCn: 我愿改变一切，如果我们可以重回往昔。

trans.tranOther: to make a  cassette  tape or  video  go backwards in order to see or hear it again
